useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: Use Apify Proxy to fetch articles

callbackUrl.title: Callback URL
callbackUrl.description: When an article is extracted, send a POST request to this URL

openAIAPIKey.title: Open AI API Key
openAIAPIKey.description: Include your OpenAI API key to be able to parse any articles not natively supported by this actor

openAIParse.title: Parse with OpenAI
openAIParse.description: If this actor encounters an unsupported website, it can use OpenAI to parse the article
